overview:
La Mode is a growing web-based specialty retailer of fashionable, value-priced apparel and accessories. We provide exciting, fashion-forward merchandise that appeals to a broad range of customers, with a core emphasis on the lifestyle trends for women. As of February 1, 2012, La Mode operated nation wide including Alaska and Puerto Rico.

Founded in 2012, La Mode was opened in Springfield, MA. Focused on women clothing, The web-store offers customers access to major fashion trends at value-oriented price.

Contact Us

La Mode P.O. Box 1903 Springfield, MA 01101

Phone: (413)364-5098 Web: www.lamodema.com Web Support- support@lamodema.com

La Mode Today

La Mode is a growing, web-based specialty retailer of fashionable, value- priced apparel and accessories. We are focused on providing exciting, fashion- forward merchandise that appeals to customer across socioeconomic boundaries, with a core emphasis on the lifestyle trends of women.

We love what we do at La Mode helping the community and making women look good.
